BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot's OAuth Token, available in Features > OAuth & Permissions > OAuth Tokens & Redirect URLs > Tokens for Your Workspace (Bot User OAuth Access Token)

SLACK_APP_VERSION.description: Slack App version number; right now all slack apps are v0

SLACK_APP_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Slack App Signing Secret, available in Settings > Basic Information > App Credentials (Signing Secret)
